Description:
Detects potentially suspicious child processes of "regsvr32.exe".

Author: elhoim, Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potentially Suspicious Child Process Of Regsvr32
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((parent_process_path like '%egsvr32.exe' and (process_path like '%\calc.exe' or process_path like '%\cscript.exe' or process_path like '%\explorer.exe' or process_path like '%\mshta.exe' or process_path like '%
et.exe' or process_path like '%
et1.exe' or process_path like '%
ltest.exe' or process_path like '%
otepad.exe' or process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe' or process_path like '%eg.exe' or process_path like '%\schtasks.exe' or process_path like '%\werfault.exe' or process_path like '%\wscript.exe')) and  not (process_path like '%\werfault.exe' and command like '% -u -p %'))
